name: Perfect Synergy
description:
You have to work again with your scientist partner! You two are capable of merging two components to create a brand new object in less than 5 seconds! 

But, stay focused, because taking more than that, will be an automatic Game Over...

Have fun trying to merge 10 objects in one run, and demonstrate why you two are STRONGER TOGETHER!

This game has been made for the Brackeys' Game Jam 2021.1

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5

GAME MADE BY 

 Sergi Monreal Ibáñez

Miquel Villalobos Verde
